item.title: Hurricane leaves trail of destruction across Caribbean
item.description: The storm has been downgraded from a Category 5 to a Category 2 storm but is gathering speed.

item.title: Sudan RSF chief promises investigation as anger mounts over el-Fasher killings
item.description: The announcement comes after growing reports of mass killings, including of patients at a hospital.

item.title: Trump hails 'amazing' meeting with China's Xi but no formal trade deal agreed
item.description: The US president and his Chinese counterpart met face-to-face for the first time in six years.

item.title: Dutch centrist liberals neck and neck with populist Wilders in tight election
item.description: Rob Jetten's D66 party celebrates but with most of the votes counted the result is too close to call.

item.title: Trump directs nuclear weapons testing to resume for first time in over 30 years
item.description: It is necessary for the US to keep pace with weapons programmes in China and Russia, the president says.
